data.message: What I don't like about it is that they should stop the bad language and the bullying, the third finger pic. Posting and the scams coming from people you don't know. When you bring it to Thursday fB user they arrange to take it off.and before you know it, it gets right back on your page. So you end up defriending them and some how or some way they get right back on your page. That's not a friend!
